com.ericsson.commonlibrary.proxy

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericsson.commonlibrary.proxy.Util

  • public final class Util
extends Object
    Collection of utilities that could be useful in the interception domain.
    Author:
    Elis Edlund (elis.edlund@ericsson.com)

                                                            Class<?>... interfaces)
        Check if the given object implements the given set of interfaces.
        Type Parameters:
        T - target object type
        Parameters:
        object - to check if it implement interfaces
        interfaces - that the object should implement
        Returns:
        if the object implements all interfaces

        Returns:

      • methodSignatureEquals

        public static boolean methodSignatureEquals(Method method,
                                            Method method2)
        Check if two methods have the same signature. Return type(not part of the signature) and declaring class is ignored
        Parameters:
        method - first method to compare
        method2 - second method to compare
        Returns:
        if the methods was equals or not.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • castStringValueToObject

        public static <T> T castStringValueToObject(String stringToCast,
                                            Class<T> classToCastTo,
                                            Invocation invocation)
        Utility method to help convert a String to an actual object of other common types. Like all primitives type(and object variants) Enums,Files and some simple Collections support to convert comma separated string into List of one of the supported simple types.
        Type Parameters:
        T - target object type
        Parameters:
        stringToCast - the string that you want to convert to another type.
        classToCastTo - resulting Clas of the object you want to convert the String to
        invocation - only needed for Collection types.
        Returns:
        actual object with the provided type.

      • castStringValueToObject

        public static <T> T castStringValueToObject(String stringToCast,
                                            Class<T> classToCastTo)
        Utility method to help convert a String to an actual object of other common types. Like all primitives type(and object variants) Enums, Files.
        Type Parameters:
        T - target object type
        Parameters:
        stringToCast - the string that you want to convert to another type.
        classToCastTo - resulting Clas of the object you want to convert the String to
        Returns:
        actual object with the provided type.

      • castStringValueToMethodReturnType

        public static <T> T castStringValueToMethodReturnType(String stringToCast,
                                                      Class<T> classToCastTo,
                                                      Method method)
        Utility method to help convert a String to an actual object of other common types. Like all primitives type(and object variants) Enums, Files and some simple Collections support to convert comma separated string into List of one of the supported simple types.
        Type Parameters:
        T - target object type
        Parameters:
        stringToCast - the string that you want to convert to another type.
        classToCastTo - resulting Clas of the object you want to convert the String to
        method - only needed for Collection types.
        Returns:
        actual object with the provided type.

      • defaultToEmptyCollectionsOnNullValue

        public static <T> T defaultToEmptyCollectionsOnNullValue(Class<T> collectionClass,
                                                         T value)
        Will default null values for collections types (and arrays) to an empty variant of that type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - target object type
        Parameters:
        collectionClass - the collection class
        value - the collection which will be unchanged and this method will only return a empty collection if the this given value is null.
        Returns:
        original value or empty collections instead of null

      • getGenericTypeOfReturnType

        public static Class<?> getGenericTypeOfReturnType(Method method)
        Get the generic return type of the provided method, Meaning the String.class from a method like public List<String> method() and String.class from a method like public Map<String,Integer> method()
        Parameters:
        method - to fetch return type from
        Returns:
        generic type of the return type

      • getSecondGenericTypeOfReturnType

        public static Class<?> getSecondGenericTypeOfReturnType(Method method)
        Get the second generic return type of the provided method, Meaning the Integer.class from a method like: public Map<String,Integer> method()
        Parameters:
        method - to fetch return type from
        Returns:
        second generic type of the return type

      • findMethodWithSignatureInClass

        public static Method findMethodWithSignatureInClass(Method methodSignature,
                                                    Class<?>... classesToLookIn)
        Find the first found method that is matching the given methodSignature. notice the methodSignature does not have be same Method object, So declaredClass and returntype is not part of signature matching.
        Parameters:
        methodSignature - a method signature that you want to find and invoke,
        classesToLookIn - classes to look for the method in.
        Returns:
        the first found method, or null if none was found
